name: bohgan
normalized: (what is he talking about all of a sudden…?
is this man…?
he wanted to give the finishing touches and complete the degradation of the pig-sluts in my absence.
i couldn’t say that i would be too happy with that.
sure, i was surprised by the sudden dizziness.
it probably was necessary for me to conduct a detailed mri scan after this, as well.
however, the brainwashing and remodelling process was the exception to any rules.
transferring the original personalities of women onto micro-chips and seeing them unable to even raise screams of despair,
all those pleasurable things, made the time it took to complete the brainwashing and remodelling process completely worth it.
moreover, why did you want to know the cancellation-code for the brainwashing machine?
that code was only meant for use in the unlikely event that the brainwashing machine was discovered, and needed to be destroyed with an explosion in order to erase all evidence of its existence.
which is why, i was the only one who knew it.
i became suspicious of hans who was blabbering on beside me about things like 『just to be thorough』 and 『we are worried about the captain’s health』.

name: bohgan
normalized: (something isn’t right here.

name: bohgan
normalized: (the hans i know is a man who would never say such things.

name: bohgan
normalized: (is this the real hans…?
an intense feeling of unease.

name: bohgan
normalized: leave me alone!
i pushed hans away, even though he was supporting my body.
with my right hand.
that is when i realized.
i had touched my right hand on the floor a while back,
and had felt the cold sensation of the floor with it.
similar to how i would usually feel when touching it with my left arm.
that couldn’t be.
my right arm had been sliced off.
and now, my right arm was a prosthetic.
no matter how far science progressed, a difference would always exist between feeling something through flesh and blood compared to feeling it through a machine.
that difference had always made me realize that my left arm was made of flesh and blood.
and yet, just a while back “there had been no difference”.
i had felt the coldness, as if it was my left arm.

name: bohgan
normalized: kuuh!
i touched my left arm with my right hand and my right arm with my left hand.
it felt the same.
it felt exactly the same.
that couldn’t be.
which meant――
all of this wasn’t real.

name: bohgan
normalized: (this is a dream!

damn!

this wasn’t reality!
this was a dream!
my right arm was made of flesh and blood!
my right arm, which should have been a prosthetic arm!

there are moments, when you feel like the parts that you had lost still exist.
in other words, i had done this myself in order to fulfil that desire of mine.
in a dream!
i was being interrogated inside a dream, with the use of the dream-memory infiltration device!

but, since when!?
since when had i been dreaming!?
the headache from a while back.

how many times had it been used on me!?

it couldn’t have been only once.
twice!?

that wasn’t something he could ask the very first time.
the first time he had learnt about the explosive device in the brainwashing device from me.
and this time, he had asked me the manner in which to activate it.
two dream-memory infiltrations…
which meant the probability of me becoming invalid was 50%!
had i gone insane already!?
where was it!?
where was my true memory!?
think!
what could i do!?
was it possible to escape from within a dream!?

the sharp-sighted olov noticed me and i made quick eye-contact with him, before closing my eyes.
